data.message: For us Facebook has rekindle so many relatives, classmates,  friends from the pasted. A big reunion daily!

replies.message:
That is wonderful, Linda! We’re so happy you were able to reconnect with friends and family. We appreciate you being a part of our community. 
-Chantal
Yes, I have been able to rekindle friendships from across the Nation and the World; I have been able to see new children born into the family....great system!

This is Real, I have found Loved Ones I thought where far away but in reality are a walk away, God Is Great, I Love Him for the work He has guided me to correct in my life in obedience to Him... This is why I post in sharing my Heart in Hopes to plant seeds of Faith, Hope and Love>>> When you feel everyone in the world is against you, turn to God Who Support & Loves You Unconditionally, He will Straighten the crooked Path and allow you to do AllThings With Him...      Peace & Blessings!!!
Thank you Facebook for enabling me to meet and engage with everyone from family to celebrities that l never thought I would get to meet. You guys are the best!
Ihave foundLoved Ones Thank you facebook love you
Sacred Heart School and Band Roslindale Mass.
You're so right,Love my whole family !!!
even made some dear friends across the sea!  so very interesting and  needed.
Keeps me in touch with family and friends across the country on a daily basis.
I love FB...  great pass time, great diversion, but most of all, it helps me keep in touch with family and friends without spending hours on end on the phone.

I have connected with relatives I didn't even know I had and through facebook feel like I have known them all my life. It's great for me to be able to go back and forth with them. Lots of fun sharing things. Let's us know how much alike we really are and never knew the other existed.     Also found old friends which is really a thrill. Thank you fb.
Hey Shafia. You can learn how to change your Page name here: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806 -Chantal
